Articles.Content:
Because ksp hits my sweet spot somewhere in between designing, realism, sci-fi/non realism, spaceflight/orbital mechanics, science, trail and (a lot of) error, puzzling, nice views, non violance, but then again the occasional explosion and the ever present tension of "is this going to work?", "are they going to make it?", "what's next?"

Because it's the near perfect game for me.

Because I'm bored with recent triple A games with emphasis on graphic and system requirements, yet very little replay value. I love games with freedom and replayability, not constrained in a single corridor gameplay script. So for me, a game where I can build and fly anything I made, and doing whatever I want is obviously my go-to choice. If I'm getting bored? Well, there's always mod. If I'm bored because there's no friend to play with? Just go to the forum

Because I like everything is related to space and spaceships. For example, I like to play EVE Online too and I even sometimes buy EVE isk https://mmoauctions.com/eve-online/isk

Edited August 6, 2018 by func

I like space and all things around it. The fact that it is also awesome sandbox game and you can do everything you want is great.

I don't have any issues with docking or any other things. I also like wide variety of mods that ksp offers.

However I really hate random kraken attacks that randomly explode my ships, this really makes me quit game instantly. Also it hits my GPU very hard (probably because my gpu is excrements) do I can't play on full texture quality
